Detailed Description

This class provide method which can be used to instantiate menu XML resource into Menu objects.

The MenuInflater class can be used to instantiate corresponding Menu objects from the content of a menu XML file.

For performance reasons, the XML files are pre-processing that is done at build time.

Therefore, it only works with an unique resource ID from the resource system(R::something file.)

The following example demonstrates how to use the MenuInflater 

 class MyPage : gaia::core::Page {
   public:
     MyPage();
     virtual ~MyPage();
     virtual void onInit();
     virtual bool onCreateOptionsMenu(gaia::core::Menu* menu);

   private:
     gaia::core::MenuInflater* mpMenuInflater;
     gaia::core::Context* mpContext;
     gaia::ui::LinearController* mpLinearController;
 };

 MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const savedInstanceState) {
 //instantiate the Scene to manage visual interface
 Scene* mpScene = Scene::SceneFactory(this);
 mpContext = new Context(this);

 //instantiate the MenuInflater
 MenuInflater* mpMenuInflater = new MenuInflater(mpContext);

 //instantiate the LinearController
 mpLinearController = new LinearController(this);

 mpScene->attachController(mpLinearController);
 mpScene->setupSceneLayout();
 }

 bool MyPage::onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu* menu) {
   //using a unique resource ID to instantiate Menu object
   mpMenuInflater->inflate(MyPage::R::menu::options_menu, menu);
 }

void gaia::core::MenuInflater::inflate ( int32_t  menuRes,
gaia::core::Menu *  menu 
)

Inflate the menu hierarchy from the specified XML resource.

Parameters:
[in]menuResResource ID for an XML layout resource to load (e.g, R::menu::main).
[in]menuThe Menu to inflate into. The items and submenus will be added to this Menu.
